channel.title: Comments on: Plural Sources of Kashmiri Myths

item.title: By: abid
item.dc:creator: abid
item.description: Dear usman. thank you for reading. mail me at mabidahmad@gmail.com
item.content:encoded: Dear usman. thank you for reading. mail me at mabidahmad@gmail.com

item.title: By: Usman Riaz
item.dc:creator: Usman Riaz
item.description:
Salaam Abid, Firstly, the article is beautifully written, Kudos ! I found the information to be very illuminating.
The article was hard to find, I found it after searching on the internet for an electronic text or audio of the above said folklore 'Aknandun' which I am researching for a project ; which I have been unable to find anywhere. Might it be possible for you to help me out in any way?
Kindly email me, if so
item.content:encoded:
Salaam Abid,
Firstly, the article is beautifully written, Kudos !
I found the information to be very illuminating.

The article was hard to find, I found it after searching on the internet for an electronic text or audio of the above said folklore ‘Aknandun’ which I am researching for a project ; which I have been unable to find anywhere. Might it be possible for you to help me out in any way?

Kindly email me, if so
